amendment.description: Amendment sought to address concerns in which Federal employees are permitted to engage in union-related activities while at work at the VA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to pay a Federal Employee for any period of time during which such employee is using official time under U.S. Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hice, Jody B. amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 232 (Roll no. 190).

action.text: Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. Hice, Jody B..
